This data set contains a cat scan of a chest (thanks to Steve Demlow from 
vital images for providing the data and transfer function).  The resolution 
of the data set is:

 x_res = 256
 y_res = 256
 slices = 279

For this object there is a unique color and opacity for each density
stored in the file.  Although the density is stored on a 0.0 to 1.0
range, there are only 256 unique densities in this object.  The
mapping between these 256 densities and the matching color and opacity
is given below.  To index into this mapping you will need to multiply
the stored density by 255.  The four columns in the mapping contain
the following values (in order):

density  red  green  blue  opacity
0   12   0   0   0 
1   18   0   0   1 
2   23   0   0   2 
3   29   0   0   3 
4   34   0   0   4 
5   40   0   0   5 
6   45   0   0   6 
7   51   0   0   7 
8   56   0   0   8 
9   62   0   0   9 
10   68   0   0  10 
11   73   0   0  11 
12   79   0   0  12 
13   84   0   0  13 
14   90   0   0  14 
15   95   0   0  15 
16  101   0   0  16 
17  106   0   0  17 
18  112   0   0  18 
19  117   0   0  19 
20  123   0   0  20 
21  128   0   1  21 
22  134   0   3  22 
23  139   0   5  23 
24  145   0   7  24 
25  150   0   9  25 
26  156   1  11  26 
27  161   2  13  27 
28  167   4  15  28 
29  172   5  17  29 
30  178   7  19  30 
31  179   8  21  31 
32  180  10  22  32 
33  182  11  24  33 
34  183  13  26  34 
35  184  14  28  35 
36  185  16  30  36 
37  186  17  32  37 
38  187  18  34  38 
39  189  20  36  39 
40  190  21  38  40 
41  191  23  38  41 
42  192  24  38  42 
43  193  26  39  43 
44  194  27  39  44 
45  196  29  39  45 
46  197  30  39  46 
47  198  32  40  47 
48  199  33  40  48 
49  200  34  40  49 
50  202  36  41  50 
51  203  37  41  51 
52  204  39  41  52 
53  205  40  41  53 
54  206  42  42  54 
55  207  43  42  55 
56  209  45  42  56 
57  210  46  43  57 
58  211  48  43  58 
59  212  49  43  59 
60  213  51  43  60 
61  214  54  44  61 
62  216  58  44  62 
63  217  62  44  63 
64  218  66  45  64 
65  219  70  45  65 
66  220  73  45  66 
67  222  77  45  67 
68  223  81  46  68 
69  224  85  46  69 
70  225  89  46  70 
71  226  93  47  71 
72  227  96  47  72 
73  229 100  47  73 
74  230 104  48  74 
75  231 108  48  75 
76  232 112  48  76 
77  233 116  48  77 
78  234 119  49  78 
79  236 123  49  79 
80  237 127  49  80 
81  238 131  50  81

83  240 138  50  83 
84  242 142  50  84
